name: TG Smart Air Cooler 40L – Powerful & Energy-Efficient Air Cooling Solution, Large Water Tank, Honeycomb Cooling Pads,| Dark Grey
features: Powerful Cooling with Large 40L Tank: Designed for effective cooling
the TG SMART Air Cooler features a spacious 40L water tank
ensuring long hours of uninterrupted cooling without frequent refills.
Honeycomb Cooling Pads for Enhanced Performance: Equipped with high-quality honeycomb cooling pads
this air cooler efficiently absorbs heat and cools the air quickly
providing fresh and breezy airflow in any room.
Adjustable 3-Speed Control & High Air Delivery: The cooler offers three fan speed settings—low
and high—allowing you to customize airflow
while the powerful motor ensures high air delivery for wide coverage.
Energy-Efficient & Low Noise Operation: Designed to be cost-effective
it consumes less power compared to traditional air conditioners
making it an energy-saving option with silent operation for undisturbed sleep.
Portable & Easy to Use: Featuring a lightweight design with smooth-rolling caster wheels
the TG SMART Air Cooler is easy to move between rooms
